backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access-controlled user profiles, product/category CRUD, and order storage with admin/user permissions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining layout and all storefront/admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart items with localStorage persistence and utility methods.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Admin-only access screen prompting login and explaining authorization restrictions.
Component that checks authentication and admin status before rendering protected routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to set a display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/brand/PremiumTag: Simple component displaying the premium dining tagline.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright text for Hanma store.
frontend/src/components/nav/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, cart button, login, and admin-aware menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders filter buttons for categories, allowing selection or clearing of a category.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays product details with image, price, and an add‑to‑cart button, linking to product pages.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Shows an error alert with optional retry button and customizable message.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton loaders for product cards, product grids, and tables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, state tracking, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, orders, and catalogs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete product categories with dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, totals, and customer data, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a table of all orders with basic info, error/loading handling, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product management UI including listing, creating, editing, and deleting products with form dialogs and category integration.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation when empty.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Loads product catalog, filters by category, handles errors, and lets users add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order form submission, order creation, cart clearing, and shows a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with promotional content and a call-to-action button linking to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info, handles loading/error states, and allows adding the product to the cart.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project features, versions, and high-level architecture for an ICP e‑commerce template.
